fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value: - You may choose one person during the night to Jail for the day.

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
- You may anonymously talk with your prisoner.
- You may choose to attack your prisoner, no limits on how many times per day.
- The jailed target can't perform their day ability.
- All other abilities used on the jailed person will fail; they will be notified that their target was jailed.
- Your attack is delivered at the end of the day.
- Your target cannot vote, whisper, or speak in the Day chat. They may still read the chat.
- Only their teammates who share a factional chat will be notified they were jailed.
- If your target is voted to be hanged, it will fail.
- The Day Jailor is functionally a Town role in every way except win condition/goal.
